body:
The changes in this pull request make the following improvements to the `zoltan` package:
- Fix numerous bugs with `zoltan+mpi` installation variants.
- Fix a couple of bugs with `zoltan@:3.6+fortran` installation variants.
- Improve the overall structure of the installation script.

Please let me know if there are any problems with these updates and I'll fix them as soon as I can!
title: Update Package : Zoltan
